entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 3 except 6 inland.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3 except 6 inland. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016
